title: Skin I got in Mystery Gift
body:
Hello,
I recently obtained a mystery gift skin, however I accidentally clicked dismiss without seeing the skin I received. Considering purchase history is no longer available, I was wondering what skin I received.
Thank you.

replies.body: The pop up toast you got was for the anniversary icon.  Mystery gifts are not done being sent out, and it's going to be a while as there are many accounts to cover.  Stay up to date at our [support banner](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/227317608--Sept-14-Anniversary-gifts-are-currently-being-distributed-You-may-not-receive-them-right-away-so-please-be-patient-) as gifts continue to be sent out.  Patience!

You can see your purchase history still.
Go to the shop and all the way to the right is an account button, click it you can find it there.
